title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1206.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1206.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part establishes procedures through which local
governments may apply for and receive moneys available under section
54-g
of the

State Finance Law in support of activities related to the administration and
enforcement of fire prevention and building codes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1206.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
